lines.text:
[Kei grunts]
What kind of movies do you like?

[Kei mumbles something]
Excuse me,could you speak up,please?

[in a movie, sees boy sitting on a bench]
Oh, there you are, darling!
There's something I have to tell you. I think we should stop seeing each other. Actually...

[hurt]
No! I know there's another girl. I've known it for a long time. But I thought I'd won!
But how could you? You kissed me, darling! How could you?

[furious]
One little kiss is no big deal!
[kicks her, sending her skidding across the park]
I can't permit this charade to continue! God may allow this wedding, but I will not!
